1571x
 
1x
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
1x
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
import 'jquery-knob';
 
const selectors = {
	time: '.js-m-countdown__time',
	timeInput: '.js-m-countdown__input',
	timeHourLabel: '.js-m-countdown__time--hour .js-m-countdown__label',
	timeInputHour: '.js-m-countdown__input--hour',
	timeMinuteLabel: '.js-m-countdown__time--minute .js-m-countdown__label',
	timeInputMinute: '.js-m-countdown__input--minute',
	timeSecondLabel: '.js-m-countdown__time--second .js-m-countdown__label',
	timeInputSecond: '.js-m-countdown__input--second',
	expiredLabel: '.js-m-countdown__expired',
};
 
const options = {
	dateToCountDown: 'data-date-countdown-seconds',
	circleWidth: 41,
	circleHeight: 41,
};
 
class Countdown {
	constructor($el) {
		this.circleWidth = options.circleWidth;
		this.circleHeight = options.circleHeight;
		this.$timeInput = $el.find(selectors.timeInput);
		this.$timeHourLabel = $el.find(selectors.timeHourLabel);
		this.$timeInputHour = $el.find(selectors.timeInputHour);
		this.hourIsSingular = false;
		this.$timeMinuteLabel = $el.find(selectors.timeMinuteLabel);
		this.$timeInputMinute = $el.find(selectors.timeInputMinute);
		this.minuteIsSingular = false;
		this.$timeSecondLabel = $el.find(selectors.timeSecondLabel);
		this.$timeInputSecond = $el.find(selectors.timeInputSecond);
		this.$expiredLabel = $el.find(selectors.expiredLabel);
		this.secondIsSingular = false;
		this.voucherSeconds = $el.attr(options.dateToCountDown) || 0;
		this.timeStart = this.voucherSeconds;
		this.interval = false;
 
		this.drawCircles();
 
		if (this.voucherSeconds !== 0) {
			this.startCountdown(this.timeStart);
		}
	}
 
	drawCircles() {
		const _this = this;
		this.$timeInput.knob(
			{
				width: _this.circleWidth,
				height: _this.circleHeight,
				bgColor: '#f0c800',
				fgColor: '#ffffff',
				inputColor: '#332b00',
				skin: 'tron',
				readOnly: true,
				thickness: 0.15,
				lineWidth: 2,
				font: 'Roboto',
				rotation: 'clockwise',
			},
		);
		// override fix font of generated canvas
		this.$timeInput.css('font-size', '14px');
	}
 
	startCountdown(duration) {
		const _this = this;
		let start = Date.now();
		let hasStarted = false;
		let diff;
		let hours;
		let hoursIsSingular;
		let minutes;
		let minutesIsSingular;
		let seconds;
		let secondsIsSingular;
 
		function timer() {
			diff = duration - (((Date.now() - start) / 1000));
 
			hours = Math.abs(parseInt(diff / 3600, 10) % 24);
			hoursIsSingular = hours === 1;
 
			if (hoursIsSingular !== _this.hourIsSingular) {
				_this.updateLabelHours();
				_this.hourIsSingular = hoursIsSingular;
			}
 
			minutes = Math.abs(parseInt(diff / 60, 10) % 60);
			minutesIsSingular = minutes === 1;
 
			if (minutesIsSingular !== _this.minuteIsSingular) {
				_this.updateLabelMinutes();
				_this.minuteIsSingular = minutesIsSingular;
			}
 
			seconds = Math.abs(parseInt(Math.round(parseFloat(diff)), 10) % 60);
			secondsIsSingular = seconds === 1;
 
			if (secondsIsSingular !== _this.secondIsSingular) {
				_this.updateLabelSeconds();
				_this.secondIsSingular = secondsIsSingular;
			}
 
			const strHours = hours < 10 ? `0${hours}` : hours;
			const strMinutes = minutes < 10 ? `0${minutes}` : minutes;
			const strSeconds = seconds < 10 ? `0${seconds}` : seconds;
 
			if (hours === 0 && minutes === 0 && seconds === 0 && hasStarted) {
				_this.updateCircleValues(strHours, strMinutes, strSeconds);
				_this.showCountdownExpired();
				window.clearInterval(_this.interval);
			} else {
				_this.updateCircleValues(strHours, strMinutes, strSeconds);
			}
 
			if (diff <= 0) {
				// add one second so that the count
				// example 05:00 not 04:59
				start = Date.now() + 1000;
			}
 
			hasStarted = true;
		}
 
		// we don't want to wait a full second before the timer starts
		timer();
		this.interval = setInterval(timer, 1000);
	}
 
	updateCircleValues(hours, minutes, seconds) {
		this.$timeInputHour.val(hours).trigger('change');
		this.$timeInputMinute.val(minutes).trigger('change');
		this.$timeInputSecond.val(seconds).trigger('change');
	}
 
	updateLabelHours() {
		this.$timeHourLabel.toggleClass('js-hidden');
	}
 
	updateLabelMinutes() {
		this.$timeMinuteLabel.toggleClass('js-hidden');
	}
 
	updateLabelSeconds() {
		this.$timeSecondLabel.toggleClass('js-hidden');
	}
 
	showCountdownExpired() {
		this.$expiredLabel.addClass('js-visible');
	}
}
 
export default Countdown;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Aug 28 2017 16:13:34 GMT+0200 (CEST)
